name: Tembok Labirin
description:
Tembok labirin is an escape room game with a procedural system built into it, which means that when you restart the game, the maze inside the game also resets and this will keep repeating every time you press restart. Your objective is to find the treasure in the game, and each stage has a different maze size and time limit.

The mechanics of playing this game are quite simple, using the keyboard and mouse:
WASD = Move 
Esc (Escape) = pause 
Space = Jump 
Mouse = Camera 
Left click = Confirm

Please fill out the available form after playing the game for me and the development of this game.

Thank you and good luck :)
